Clear

GenerateOrthographic

public void GenerateOrthographic( float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float zNear, float zFar );
Generates a othographic projection matrix.
Parameters:
left - The left side of the view.
right - The right side of the view.
bottom - The bottom side of the view.
top - The top side of the view.
zNear - The near clipping plane.
zFar - The far clipping plane.

GeneratePerspective

public void GeneratePerspective( float fov, float aspect, float nearz, float farz );
Generates a perpective projection matrix.
Parameters:
fov - The field of view in degrees.
aspect - The aspect ratio.
nearz - The near clipping plane.
farz - The far clipping plane.

LookAt

public void LookAt( vec3 pos, vec3 at, vec3 up );
Generates a look-at matrix.
Parameters:
pos - Position of the camera.
at - The look-at location of the camera.
up - The up axis for the camera.
